title: 'Not recommended'
body: First watch had a charging problem after replaced with a new one. Within 2 months again had the charging problem. Thrown the watch under my bed on one bad day. I haven't seen a worst watch from Noise. Don't waste your money. Rise to awake feature to show time is utter glitch and a 700rs China watch doing well than this.

title: 'Not happy with this watch'
body: I'm not happy with this watch, it drains battery too fast even after turning off on blutooth calling the watch battery drain too fast.  If possible I want to exchange this watch.  And it not even charge sometimes, I think I got a defect piece.

title: 'The most pathetic product'
body: 'I regret buying this product .... The product software is the worst nightmare..... The connectivity with app is too slow and the app would just hang or crash  After using it for 15-20 days the device would just not charge even after changing 3 different charging cables and sockets ..... For 30 sec the device would start and app would show 100% charge .....  When I tried calling on customer care they directed me to the app help & support  The app is also th worst that I have seen ..... It would take you through the process of clicking photos of the product and uploading and then our if nowhere error 205 would pop up ..... This happened atleast 7 times  Dear noise ..... If you are seeing this message then please return my money or replace my device ....  I chose noise after using fitbit for 5 years  Tejas Desai'

title: 'So nice quality'
body: It's been 1 week since I got this watch. I found its performance very good in these week. I bought this watch in Jet color.( Photos Uploaded for review) The design of this watch is Bold Sporty by noise. After delivery i kept watch on charging for 1 hour & still not charged. The battery of this watch runs comfortably for 7-8 days.. Overall display feedback is good. The brightness is very good. There are also several sports modes. One drawback in this is that the watch faces are very few. Overall buttons quality is average. The quality of the strap is very good. Most importantly, this watch has an IP67 rating. It helps a lot during monsoons. Overall noise fit force is a very nice watch.
